summary.span: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.

returns.span: An that can iterate through the collection.

span.span: An that can iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，您必須呼叫將列舉值前進到再讀取的值集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 設定下一個項目。 sets to the next item. 集合的末端後，列舉程式會放置在集合中，最後一個項目之後和呼叫傳回`false`。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling returns `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要設定集合一次的第一個項目，您可以呼叫後面。To set to the first item of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之間修改集合和，會傳回設定為時，項目，即使列舉值已經無效。If the collection is modified between and , will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向前復原開始的第一個主要畫面格，並在最後一個主要畫面格結束，則會搜尋集合。The collection is searched forward starting at the first key frame and ending at the last key frame. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 也就是說，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是。That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
